plugins.name: kubevirt
plugins.description: Core KubeVirt workflows for VM lifecycle debugging and component analysis

commands.name: analyze-virt-components
commands.description: Analyze virt-handler, virt-launcher, and virt-controller logs

commands.name: vm-lifecycle-debug
commands.description: Debug VM creation, startup, and lifecycle issues

commands.name: vm-migration-debug
commands.description: Debug VM migration failures and issues

plugins.name: virt-must-gather
plugins.description: Analyze KubeVirt must-gather archives for VM diagnostics and troubleshooting

commands.name: vm-failure
commands.description: Quick analysis of specific VM failure from must-gather

plugins.name: utils
plugins.description: A generic utilities plugin serving as a catch-all for various helper commands
